titleStmt.title: The last speeches of Thomas Wentworth, late Earle of Strafford, and deputy of Ireland The one in the Tovver, the other on the scaffold on Tower-Hill, May the twelfth. 1641. Together with his deportment before and at the end of his execution.
titleStmt.author: Strafford, Thomas Wentworth, Earl of, 1593-1641.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
